We (Compose, YC s11, now part of IBM) are hiring for a bunch of positions. Notably — 

* Platform engineer (https://www.compose.io/jobs/#platform-engineer): if you like working on distributed systems, containers, and tremendous database problems in the real world, this is for you.

* Technical Content Creator (https://www.compose.io/jobs/#technical-content-creator): This is an interesting role, it's not quite marketing and not quite engineering. If you like creating content, can explain how to solve problems, and know how to talk to developers, give it a look.
